description:
Arajin surprises everyone when he uses Senya`s power to land a punch on Marito. Marito falls in love with that fist and tries to convince Arajin to join Siguma Squad, but Matakara asks Arajin to join Minato Kai to continue their Honki training together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je veux t’inviter à bord ! Tchiou-tchiou, le train de l’amour au bœuf !
Kimi o Nosetai! Chuuchuu Chinjao Rosu Train!
Wanna Take You On! The Chu Chu Chinese Pepper Steak Train!
君を乗せたい! チューチュー・チンジャオローストレイン!
